commit message: Fixed a memory leak
Run SubscriptionRefresh callback on the main thread
Reduced number of cached palettes to 20
Removed some dependencies on legacy code
Rewrote large parts of the code to use Otto for events
Align icon in playpause button
Centered the icon the PlayPause button in the emulator. Verify this also works on a device
Rewrote the 'Reset playlist' to use Otto
Enabled option to only show downloaded episodes
Remove episodes from the (show only downloaded) playlist when they are deleted
Rewrote a lot of the event based logic to wirk with otto
Updated dependencies and build system
Updated headset priority
Updated Fresco and moved the queue button to the right of the FeedView
Added ability to hide the episode text in the player
Updated Fresco to 0.6.1
Replaced internal app communication with otto
Updated some build files
Fixed issue where the notification would redraw multiple times
Updated search result look
Updated the look and feel of the Discovery Fragment
Cleans out tmp folder
Added scrollbars to the FeedView, still no fastscroll
Added animations to the FeedView
Updated the Play/Pause buttons in the FeedView
Added duration,filesize and date on the FeedView
Added a full circle to the playpause button for the episodes which are marked as listened
Fixed loading the correct state at startup for the topplayer cover image
Moved the fast forward/rewind buttons down next to the seekbar
Added a few buttons to the top player, still some aligning missing
Added the basic logic of keeping track of the TopPlayer fullscreen state
Added support for full screen player
Removed the favorits button
Added a filter button to the playlist actionbar (or whatever it's called now)
Updated dependencies to Android M
Crude mockup of the Playlist filters dialog
